name: My Tello
description: Say hello with the My Tello app! You can have your account details at your fingertips, see your remaining balance, check rates for any destination or find answers to your questions.  Use the app in the US while connected to the Tello network or over WiFi. When travelling in US or abroad call over WiFi using the same balance. This way you can still carry your phone number anywhere in the world and enjoy the same low costs.  Download the My Tello app for free and:  Check the balance for all your Tello products: Plans and Pay As You Go  Start calling in the US and abroad over WiFi at the same costs  Order any plan or upgrade/downgrade your existing plan  Recharge safe and easy or set up Auto Recharge to avoid running out of credit  Manage your account at a glance  View your Tello bills & usage history   Contact Customer Service directly from the app  Easy to use: 1. Download the My Tello app for free 2. Log in with your Tello phone number and Tello.com website password 3. Get direct access to your phone contacts 4. Start calling over WiFi 5. Run the My Tello app on multiple devices at once  Not a Tello.com client yet? If youre new to Tello, you will need to order a phone or bring your own device at: www.tello.com. As a Tello customer you will get:  Prepaid service, no contract commitment, pure freedom  Flexibility to Build Your Own Plan starting at $5   Lowest Pay As You Go rates for international calls and texts   The option to keep your old phone number & cell phone  Nationwide coverage  24/7 Customer Service by email & phone   The same costs and the same phone number when calling over WiFi   Unlimited 2G data, after youve used your LTE data  Data tethering across all your devices for free  *We value your opinion. Please let us know if you like our app!  Having issues with the My Tello application? Please email us at customerservice@Tello.com.
